string-array.name: event1
string-array.item: Boundaries served: Jalan Bukit Merah, Queenstown, Commonwealth, Holland close, Ghim Moh, Dover, Clementi, West Coast, Pandan Garden Teban Garden.
Dorcas Home Care Service,Blk 105 Jalan Bukit Merah #01-1912
To assist in the meals run to the home of the frail elderly.
No experience needed. Able to speak dialects or simple Malay.

string-array.name: event2
string-array.item: Thank you for expressing your interest in joining us for Small Change for Big Change (Flag Day) 2016! Through this event, we hope to:- Raise awareness about the work HFHSG does in eradicating poverty housing both locally and abroad, and- Raise funds to cover the expenses of daily operations and programmes of HFHSG
Bishan Bus Interchange 514 Bishan Street 13 Singapore 570514
